https://tmrev.io/movie/755420-Burning Ojai: Our Fire Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AehOBkEU5f3ooZQybWcajvrqtE7.jpg Documentary short following one family and the residents of Ventura County, CA through a journey of devastation, repair and survival after one of the largest wildfires in state history—the 2017 California Wildfires—destroys their beloved community. Burning Ojai: Our Fire Story
